title: Build, test, and observe retrieval pipelines in one place.
tagline: Prototype prompts, vector stores, and evaluation loops with real data.

highlights.title: Composable experiments
highlights.description: Swap retrievers, rerankers, and prompts without rewriting orchestration logic.

highlights.title: Observability first
highlights.description: Capture trace data, token usage, and quality metrics for every run.

highlights.title: Shared understanding
highlights.description: Consistent schemas keep the web UI and API aligned on what a RAG scenario looks like.

highlights.title: Fast iteration
highlights.description: Start with stub data, then connect to real corpora and evaluation pipelines as you grow.
